name: TorrentFreak Blue Theme
description: A TorrentFreak theme where every bit of pink is replaced by blue.
additional_info:
This provides an alternative blue color for torrentfreak's new theme. Pink feels too glaring and uncomfortable. It also gets rid of the odd white background on the left, which makes the page seem rather unbalanced.

Comments and suggestions welcome!
